message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product for a price of $9,500. I believe this is a fair offer considering its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $8,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I still believe that $8,500 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement at that amount.
